Logout Cancel Password FACEBOOK GOOGLE TWITTER Please select your language UK English Important, please read!! Firstly, thank you so much for downloading our app! We hope that you and your group enjoy our games and activities as much as we\'ve enjoyed making them.\n\n Please bear in mind that while we\'ve made every effort to create activities that can be used in all situations, some activities may not suit your particular environment or group situation. Please read each activity carefully before trying it and make adjustments where necessary to suit your particular situation.\n\n Also, some activities make use of prizes as a way of reinforcing the lesson. Again, this may or may not be appropriate to your particular situation, so please make your own judgement and adapt the activities to your own particular needs.\n\n Please note, by continuing to use this app you acknowledge consent to our privacy policy and terms and conditions.
